{{< entity_summary >}}
The Government of Canada spent an estimated **\$170.4M in 2021-2022** on contracts with SAP.

Across 225 contracts active since the start of the 2017-2018 fiscal year, 42 have at least one amendment (19%). Of contracts with amendments, the average increase in dollar value was 1146% and the average number of amendments was 2.1. Cumulatively these amendments represent an increase of \$87.3M over the original contract values.

The average contract duration was 1.4 years, and the average contract value (not including contracts under \$10k) was \$1.6M. The longest contract was 10.01 years. The largest contract by value (including amendments) was \$153.4M.

{{< /entity_summary >}}
